events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a full refund because it does not match the product description.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the order in question.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about your order issue. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Here is the order number 789456123 and I’ve attached a photo showing the product I received does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The refund process has been completed successfully. Please check your account in the next few days for the refund confirmation.
Just following up to ensure that you have received your refund and everything is now satisfactory with your order.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback about your support experience with the refund process.
